topic.title: Questions to improve my zite
topic.body:
Anyone got ways to add users voting to a zite ?

Also a zite-wide way to look for content ? Like, let's say I have 10 pictures in 5 folders. Being able to search for type of pictures based on the category (folders) they are in

topic.title: PornZer0 - Diverse quality porn for Zeronet
topic.body:
As the title say, here is a dedicated thread for my zite, PornZer0: http://127.0.0.1:43110/12BGFa7vq6BMvNjK2vXzNnjrsZLVBF3uTA/

I will posting in this thread after each update of the zite

topic.title: Depth limits for zites ?
topic.body: Is there a limit in Zeronet in how "deep" you can go ? I'm trying to access a file that is in folder1/folder2/folder3/file.html and it doesn't work, but folder1/folder2/file.html work. So I was wondering if there is a limit, an option in the content.json or anything ?

1604257922_1JUV6t4NFxuUQztyUWTNvyDhGz3bq.body:
| Someone (binchan?) made a chat app that can be embedded on any site. I guess a voting app can be made in the same way.

Any link ?

1605013344_15ikhUiQxJkhNQuDUaR1RuUL45p5w.body:
> [xcape2net](#comment_799_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac2kfnz): Are you aware of Syncronite ?

Finally some trackers that work for me

1606619291_1JMrG6HuqZast8Kn4n4SCjosDVAAY.body: Just go fuck yourself you dipshit

1610475632_1JUV6t4NFxuUQztyUWTNvyDhGz3bq.body: Thanks for the answer guys. So I guess the issue come from something else, argh ><

> [sirlotaplot](#comment_39_18UukzxVzEwd9ugyvKWYe2vud77GyL72Px): there could be some characters ZeroNet doesn't like in filenames?

It's only normal English letters.

This is what I get btw: "This content is blocked. Contact the site owner to fix the issue"

The page I'm trying to access is this one: http://127.0.0.1:43110/12BGFa7vq6BMvNjK2vXzNnjrsZLVBF3uTA/pages/furry/page/album.html (NSFW if by miracle it does work for you)

1607972407_1JUV6t4NFxuUQztyUWTNvyDhGz3bq.body: Modified the zite a bit. Will start adding more content once I got a dedicated server for it to help people access the content 24/7 and make sure others start to seed it
